title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements. Conduct stakeholder interviews and analyze existing data sources to identify potential skill gaps and future skill needs.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including data models, data processing pipelines, user interfaces, and integration with existing systems. Consider scalability, maintainability, performance requirements, security, and data privacy. Provide a detailed architecture diagram, documentation, and a plan for addressing potential scalability concerns during high-traffic periods. Incorporate feedback from stakeholder interviews and ensure alignment with project requirements. After completion, collaborate with the task-decomposer to break down the design into actionable tasks. Ensure that the design is easily understandable by all team members.

title: Data Acquisition and Integration
description: Identify and integrate relevant data sources, such as employee profiles, job descriptions, industry trends, and training records.

title: Skill Gap Analysis Engine
description: Develop the core algorithm and machine learning models for analyzing skill gaps and predicting future skill requirements.

title: User Interface Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for visualizing skill gap analysis results and generating reports.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store employee data, job descriptions, skill profiles, and analysis results.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures, such as authentication, authorization, and data encryption, to protect sensitive employee and organizational data.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop test plans and execute comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the production environment, configure continuous integration and deployment pipelines, and monitor system performance.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials for administrators and end-users.
